text:
@perlmutations Imagine what he´ll in 4 more years with the US & the rest of the World. Hope the US Citizen vote Trump out of Office because in the long term he is the greater Threat than Covid19. Beware of Demagogue´s & Agitators. 
Dont make the German Dark-Time-History become to our all Future
